idea: UNEEVIU TECHNOLOGIES INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED is a distributor of Security Surveillance & safety goods with smart, cost-effective yet reliable and customized systems that will suit their business needs perfectly. idea:
Amazeheads LLP is an ed-tech visionary startup formed to carry on all activities relating to imparting training, skill development courses and technology based upskilling solutions to students. The digital age is profoundly shaping the students’ learning and will also decide their future. We intend to create an app (offline / online) to host professional learning in a novel method to innovate, design, manufacture, trade and franchisee all products and services which will also include STEM based products, educational products, astronomy, publications and to set up innovation centres for students.

At Amazeheads, we have multifold offerings of Young Entrepreneurship Program, Personality development, Augmented Reality and Virtual reality backed program, coding and design thinking. We also have been actively hiring and employing a team of educators, content developers, engineers, resource persons, co-ordinators.
name: AMAZEHEADS LLP

idea: Finarya is a smart technology solution for an end-to-end Integrated Governance, Risk and Compliance. The growing size and complexity of global financial system underscores the significance of strengthening governance standards. Our product “Ethical” is designed with a mission to enhance the level of governance and empower the organizations to promote transparency in managing the stakeholders for ushering an era to Reimagine Governance.
name: FINARYA TECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
“Future outcomes are a functions of today’s decision.”

Riaan Agriventures provides an end-to-end innovative cost-effective solution by making available the unique combination of the Bio consortia and Vermicompost product to the users to avoid different purchases and applications every time.

Riaan Agriventures will promote use of Bio fortified Vermicompost which is an excellent, nutrient-rich organic fertilizer which can result into sustainable agricultural productivity and soil health improvement by targeting users (farmers), individually, at group level, village level & empowering them with the knowledge and advantages of using the unique products produced from organic sources.

Riaan Agriventures will be rewarded with great profits by selling and exporting farm produce. Also, its innovative software platform is an easy to use and well-optimized application which is used for online farming is backed by a powerful data-analytics and it also increases reachability beyond the geographical limitations, helping in training and educating the farmers and expanding the business across various locations with increased efficiency.
name: RIAAN AGRIVENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED
